label: applicableSustainabilityInspection
comment: The process of performing documented checks of sustainability characteristics, with a focus on discovering deviations, related to documented sustainability requirements.

rangeIncludes.comment: The process of performing documented checks of sustainability characteristics, with a focus on discovering deviations, related to documented sustainability requirements.

domainIncludes.comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
